reviews.text: I had the pleasure of experiencing exceptional customer service from Alex during my visit to Hot Chicken Take Off. From the moment I walked in, Alex's warm...
I have been to Hot Chicken Takeover so many times in different locations but never had the opportunity to try it at North Market.  Finally came to for lunch...

I really wanted to like this. Probably deserves a 3.5!
Service was great!
Food is pricey, hott temperature is legit! And I love it HOTT!

Wings were tasty...
